definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: Land of afforest of large area afforestation is the one big task that crosses century China.
sentences.chinese: 大面積植樹造林綠化國土是跨世紀中國的一大課題。

sentences.english: Afforestation has been promoted heaily in mid-latitudes as a means of mitigating climate change.
sentences.chinese: 在中緯度地區大力提倡植樹造林以減緩氣候變化。

sentences.english: The measures to solve these problems are to change the sowing afforestation to the planting.
sentences.chinese: 解決的主要辦法是改傳統的直播造林爲植苗造林。

sentences.english: The measures to solve these problems are to change the sowing afforestation to the planting.
sentences.chinese: 解決的主要辦法是改傳統的直播造林爲植苗造林。

sentences.english: The Three North Shelterbelt is a forestation undertaking.
sentences.chinese: 三北防護林帶是一項造林事業。

sentences.english: Thirdly, to increase afforestation to enhance carbon storage of forests.
sentences.chinese: 三是植樹造林，增強森林儲碳能力。

sentences.english: The survival rate and growth of the first year showed a close relation with shoot-root ratio and height-diameter ratio.
sentences.chinese: 造林成活率和當年生長量與莖根比和高徑比關係密切。

sentences.english: Dalbergia sissoo can be adaptable in dry-hot valley areas.
sentences.chinese: 印度黃檀適於雲南乾熱河谷地區的荒山造林。

sentences.english: In 1992~1993, introduction and forestation of Taiwania were made in Suichang County of Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 年在浙江省遂昌縣對二樹種進行了引種造林試驗。

sentences.english: Castanopsis hystrix is one of the important planting tree species of south subtropical evergreen broad-leaved forest.
sentences.chinese: 紅錐是南亞熱帶地區優良的珍貴鄉土闊葉造林樹種。

sentences.english: It was impatient to solve the low survival rate of direct seeding.
sentences.chinese: 梭梭直播造林成功率很低，是急待解決的問題。

sentences.english: Then the government and the ordinary people started to plant trees in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 政府和普通羣衆便開始在春天植樹造林。

sentences.english: To tackle the erosion problem, a large area of suitable mountains has been reforested .
sentences.chinese: 爲了解決侵蝕問題，大面積的適宜荒山已經植樹造林。

sentences.english: Judging from the present condition, afforestation by cutting stage is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 從目前情況來看，黎蒴扦插苗造林值得推廣。

sentences.english: Afforestation has been promoted heavily in mid-latitudes as a means of mitigating climate change.
sentences.chinese: 在中緯度地區大力提倡植樹造林以減緩氣候變化。

sentences.english: Forestation accomplished now will benefit our future generations.
sentences.chinese: 植樹造林，功在當代，利在千秋。

definition: to plant trees in order to stabilize sand (idiom)
